author: cnbc.com
title: Canadian Utilities & Telecom Income Fund Declares Monthly Fund Distribution
text:
TORONTO, (TSX:UTE.UN) Canadian Utilities & Telecom Income Fund declares a monthly fund distribution in the amount of $0.05215 per unit, payable on May 31, 2018 to unitholders of record on May 15, 2018.
For further information, please contact Investor Relations at 416.681.3966, toll free at 1.800.725.7172, email at info@strathbridge.com or visit www.strathbridge.com .
John Germain, Senior Vice-President & CFO
Strathbridge Asset Management Inc.
121 King Street West
Suite 2600
Toronto, Ontario, M5H 3T9
416.681.3966; 1.800.725.7172
Source: Canadian Utilities & Telecom Income Fund
